duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform inspection of aviation accessories in accordance with current technical data provided in the Component Maintenance Manuals, Services Bulletins, Service Information Letters, Airworthiness Directives, Regulations, and Quality procedures.
Ensure product integrity is maintained to all requirements.
Provide training and remain responsible for the work performed.
Monitor shelf life and properly segregate expired chemicals throughout the department.
Complete first run articles with support from engineering.
Ensure safety requirements are incorporated by each person.
Perform prefinal inspection, typing of release documents, and final release of products if performing final inspection.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or equivalent preferred.
2-4 years in inspection role within the business or 4+ years in other inspection or aviation role
